org.eclipse.californium.core.network

Class BaseMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.californium.core.network.BaseMatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Matcher
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TcpMatcher, UdpMatcher

    public abstract class BaseMatcher
extends Object
implements Matcher
    A base class for implementing Matchers that provides support for using a MessageExchangeStore.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BaseMatcher

        public BaseMatcher(NetworkConfig config,
           NotificationListener notificationListener,
           TokenGenerator tokenGenerator,
           ObservationStore observationStore,
           MessageExchangeStore exchangeStore,
           Executor executor)
        Creates a new matcher based on configuration values.
        Parameters:
        config - the configuration to use.
        notificationListener - the callback to invoke for notifications received from peers.
        tokenGenerator - token generator to create tokens for observations created by the endpoint this matcher is part of.
        observationStore - the object to use for keeping track of observations created by the endpoint this matcher is part of.
        exchangeStore - the exchange store to use for keeping track of message exchanges with endpoints.
        executor - executor to be used for exchanges. Intended to execute jobs with a striped executor.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if one of the parameters is null.

        Starts this matcher.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Description copied from interface: Matcher
        Stops this matcher.

        When this method is invoked an implementation may clear up all its internal state.

        Specified by:
        stop in interface Matcher

      • clear

        public void clear()
        This method does nothing.

        Subclasses should override this method in order to clear any internal state.

        Specified by:
        clear in interface Matcher

      • registerObserve

        protected final void registerObserve(Request request)
        Register observe request. Add observe request to the observationStore and set a message observer.
        Parameters:
        request - observe request.

      • matchNotifyResponse

        protected final Exchange matchNotifyResponse(Response response)
        Special matching for notify responses. Check, is a observe is stored in observationStore and if found, recreate a exchange.
        Parameters:
        response - notify response
        Returns:
        exchange, if a new one is create of the stored observe informations, null, otherwise.

      • cancelObserve

        public void cancelObserve(Token token)
        Cancels all pending blockwise requests that have been induced by a notification we have received indicating a blockwise transfer of the resource.
        Specified by:
        cancelObserve in interface Matcher
        Parameters:
        token - the token of the observation.
